element.name: Label
element.description: SWT Labels. Labels are simple widgets that can contain either text or an image.

property.name: color
property.description: Text color for labels.

property.name: background-color
property.description: Background color for labels.

property.name: font
property.description: Text font for labels.

property.name: border
property.description: The border that is drawn around a Label.

property.name: border-top
property.description: The top side border for labels.

property.name: border-right
property.description: The right side border for labels.

property.name: border-bottom
property.description: The bottom side border for labels.

property.name: border-left
property.description: The left side border for labels.

property.name: border-radius
property.description: Border radius. The border radius has no effect if an enhanced border, like "inset" or "outset" is used.

property.name: cursor
property.description: Control's cursor.

property.name: background-image
property.description: Background image or gradient for labels.

property.name: background-position
property.description: Background image position for labels.

property.name: background-repeat
property.description: Background image repetition for labels.

property.name: text-decoration
property.description: Decoration for label text.

property.name: opacity
property.description: The opacity of the label. A value between 0 and 1.

property.name: text-shadow
property.description: Shadow for text.

property.name: padding
property.description: Padding (inner distance) for labels.

style.name: BORDER
style.description: Indicates that the widget should have a border.

style.name: SEPARATOR
style.description: Represents SWT Labels with style SWT.SEPARATOR.

state.name: hover
state.description: Applies to widgets while the cursor hovers over them.

property.name: border
property.description: The border that is drawn for separator line.

property.name: border-top
property.description: The top side border for for separator line.

property.name: border-right
property.description: The right side border for for separator line.

property.name: border-bottom
property.description: The bottom side border for for separator line.

property.name: border-left
property.description: The left side border for for separator line.

property.name: border-radius
property.description: Border radius. The border radius has no effect if an enhanced border, like "inset" or "outset" is used.

property.name: background-color
property.description: Background color for the separator line.

property.name: background-image
property.description: Background image or gradient for the separator line.

property.name: width
property.description: Represents the width of the separator line if it's vertical or the height, if it's horizontal.

style.name: SHADOW_IN
style.description: Indicates that the separator should have a shadow-in border.

style.name: SHADOW_OUT
style.description: Indicates that the separator should have a shadow-in border.

style.name: SHADOW_NONE
style.description: Indicates that the separator should have a plain border.
